ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: I m in Boston now, and I won t be able to post as often as I did before. I ll still be posting as much as possible, though. I m still dazed from the flight, so

I'm in Boston now, and I won't be able to post as often as I did before. I'll 
still be posting as much as possible, though. I'm still dazed from the 
flight, so if this post's a bit strange, please forgive me.

Also, JP, I believe the Autobots arn't in the Ark, and Ra wouldn't be able to 
get in the Ark with all the Maximals in and around it. To do so in less than 
one post (since you never even posted his walking up and entering) is pretty 
bad moding.

::Prowl/Striker/Ramulus::

Prowl looks at Falcore, slightly confused. He sighs. "I'll set the autoguns 
to recognize him as enemy," he says and continues to walk down the hall.

Prowl spins around when he hears Lunarpine over his comm-link, seeing the 
maximal as he does so.

"Company? Where'd you pick them up?" Prowl asks, taking out his scanner.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker walks toward his quarters, picking up random important stuff to take 
to the new base.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ramulus blinks as Primal walks up to him, talks to him, and leaves. He nods, 
galloping off after Primal to see where he was heading to.
